SAINT.LIFE: A court guard and then a patrician in Constantinople, after the death of his wife and children, he left secular vanity and practiced asceticism as a monk in Annapolis. For his holy life he later was elected bishop of Amisus in Cappadocia. He died at the end of the sixth century.
